title: ‘The Challenge: Spies, Lies, and Allies’ Episode 3 With Wes Bergmann | Death, Taxes, and Bananas
description:
The alliance is strong, folks. ‘The Challenge’ icon Wes Bergmann joins Johnny Bananas to talk about Episode 3 of ‘Spies, Lies, and Allies.’ After catching up a bit, they dive into the pros and cons of the vets vs. rookies strategy that’s playing out (0:45) and Tori’s strategy or lack thereof (40:50). Then they talk about the challenge itself, nominations (47:08), and the elimination challenge (1:02:12). Finally, Johnny and Wes get to tea time when they talk about all the gossip, relationships, and revenge so far this season including Kelz’s to-do list, Ashley and Nelson’s relationship, and Amanda and Tori’s beef (1:05:30).
Host: Johnny Bananas
Guest: Wes Bergmann
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Additional Production: Juliet Litman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
